data.oai_dc:dc: Animalia, Specimen, Orthoptera, Insecta, Arthropoda, Europe, Græshopper, Denmark, Ole Fogh Nielsen, Occurrence, Grasshoppers|Animalia, Specimen, Orthoptera, Insecta, Arthropoda, Europe, Græshopper, Denmark, Ole Fogh Nielsen, Occurrence, Grasshoppers

Database of observations and specimens of Danish Grasshoppers (Orthoptera). Some observations are documented with photos or sound recordings. The specimens are mainly kept in a private collection, but some are deposited in the Natural History Museum, Aarhus, Denmark. The database includes a few records from other European countries.|731 occurrences
